log.text: If you want to view live logs of the application, enable the switch and enter a unique log category. You can view the logs by visiting console.re/<yourcategory>. Don't forget to switch it off, once done.

sentry.text: Sentry.io is an external service, that gives insights in errorrs that occured with this App on your Homey. For this reason, error details are sent automatically to this external service. If you don't want to share those details, please disable this setting.

backup.title: Backup and restore your heating plans
backup.text: Just copy the whole text from the textfield and store it in a regular text file. Be careful: Changing the contents overrides all existing plans.
backup.label: Heating plan configuration

notifications.text: Are we spamming your timeline? No problem, just turn the notifications off.

clone.title: Duplicate heating plan
clone.text: Enter a new name and presss OK to create a copy of the heating plan '__name__'.

copy.title: Copy schedule
copy.text: Select the days, you want the current schedule also be applied to.

overrides.title: Edit schedule exceptions
overrides.text: Pause the configured schedule when something special happens, e.g. you leave home unplanned, or you return earlier. To activate the special behavior, you have to set the scheduler to the appropriate mode using the plans overview page.
overrides.away: ...when you are a day away from home?

confirm.title: Do you really want to remove the heating plan?
confirm.content: Press OK to permanently remove the heating plan. This action cannot be undone.

overview.text: Give your plan a speaking name.
overview.text_enable: If you disable the plan, it is not applied automatically. You can still apply it manually via Flow.
overview.text_description: Anything important you need to remember?

schedules.text: Configure the schedules when your heating devices' temperature need to be adjusted. Additional exceptions can be configured: You leave home unplanned, or you return earlier.

zones.text: Tick the zones, to which you want this plan to be applied to. All devices that support setting a target temperature inside such zones are included.

devices.text: Tick the devices, you want this plan to be applied to. You can mix zones and individual devices, no problem.

list.title: Setpoints overview
list.text: The list shows, what the application is configuring. On the left is the current setpoints, versus read temperature on the right. If a device is not showing up, it's not configured by any active plan.

Device.plan_removed: Associated heating plan does no longer exist. Restore the plan from backup or remove the device.
